import sys

x1, y1 = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
x2, y2 = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

dx = x2 - x1
dy = y2 - y1

if dx == 0 and dy == 0:
    print(0)
    sys.exit(0)

if dx == 0:
    print(abs(dy) // 2)
    sys.exit(0)

if dy == 0:
    print(abs(dx) // 2)
    sys.exit(0)

if abs(dx) == abs(dy):
    print(abs(dx) // 2)
    sys.exit(0)

if abs(dx) > abs(dy):
    print(abs(dx) // 2 + abs(dy) // 2)
    sys.exit(0)

if abs(dx) < abs(dy):
    print(abs(dy) // 2 + abs(dx) // 2)
    sys.exit(0)

import sys

x1, y1 = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
x2, y2 = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

dx = abs(x2 - x1)
dy = abs(y2 - y1)

if dx == dy:
    print(dx)
elif dx > dy:
    print(dx - dy)
else:
    print(dy - dx)

import math

x1, y1 = map(int, input().split())
x2, y2 = map(int, input().split())

dx = abs(x2 - x1)
dy = abs(y2 - y1)

if dx == dy == 0:
    print(0)
else:
    print(math.ceil(max(dx, dy) / 2))
